< QWidgets++ - The C++ Class Library for the Photon microGUI

Author:   Markus Loffler Start Date: 8/6/98

Module: CScrollArea.hpp Description: CScrollArea class for handling PtScrollArea widgets

int CScrollArea::setIncrement ( int incrementX,

Sets the number of pixels that the widget will scroll when the user clicks the arrow buttons.

int CScrollArea::getVirtualHeight ( )
 

int CScrollArea::setVirtualSize ( int width,
int height )
 

Sets/gets the size (in pixels) of the total scrollable area. This is the widget's virtual size. To specify the displayed portion of this scrollable area, use setSize

int CScrollArea::getDisplaySize ( int & width,
int & height )
 

int CScrollArea::getDisplayWidth ( )
 

int CScrollArea::getDisplayHeight ( )
 

This is the width and the height of the truly displayed area, i.e without scrollbars (the widgets dimension doesn't take the scrollbars into account

Sets/gets the position of the displayed portion of the scrollable area

Reimplemented from CWidget.

Sets if the visibility of the x scrollbar: Never, As required, or always

int CScrollArea::displayScrollbarsNever ( )
 

int CScrollArea::displayScrollbarsAsRequired ( )
 

int CScrollArea::displayScrollbarsAlways ( )
 

Sets if the visibility of both scrollbars: Never, As required, or always

int CScrollArea::setScrollbarXHeight ( int scrollbarXHeight )
 

int CScrollArea::getScrollbarXHeight ( )
 

Sets/gets the height (in pixels) of the horizontal scrollbar. The minimum height is 6 pixels. If this resource is set to 0, the default height of 15 pixels is used.

int CScrollArea::setScrollbarYWidth ( int scrollbarYWidth )
 

int CScrollArea::getScrollbarYWidth ( )
 

Sets/gets the width (in pixels) of the vertical scrollbar. The minimum width is 6 pixels. If this resource is set to 0, the default width of 15 pixels is used.

int CScrollArea::setIgnoreKeysOn ( )
 

int CScrollArea::setIgnoreKeysOff ( )
 

int CScrollArea::isIgnoreKeys ( )
 

Prevents the scroll area from handling and consuming the arrow keys, Pg Up, Pg Dn, Home, or End.

void CScrollArea::addScrolledXCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

void CScrollArea::addScrolledYCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback that the PtScrollArea widget invokes when its scrollbars are moved. If the widget has the Pt_CALLBACKS_ACTIVE bit set in its Pt_ARG_FLAGS resource, these callbacks are also invoked when the positions of the scrollbars are changed by a call to PtSetResources().
